db:abstract.db:para: The QDnsTlsAssociationRecord class stores information about a DNS TLSA record.
This class was introduced in Qt 6.8.

db:listitem.db:para: QDnsTlsAssociationRecord is part of Network Programming APIshared

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: When performing a text lookup, zero or more records will be returned. Each record is represented by a QDnsTlsAssociationRecord instance.
The meaning of the fields is defined in RFC 6698.

db:section.db:title: enum QDnsTlsAssociationRecord::CertificateUsage
db:section.db:para: This enumeration contains valid values for the certificate usage field of TLS Association queries. The following list is up-to-date with RFC 6698 section 2.1.1 and RFC 7218 section 2.1. Please refer to those documents for authoritative instructions on interpreting this enumeration.

db:td.db:para: Indicates the record includes an association to a specific Certificate Authority that must be found in the TLS server's certificate chain and must pass PKIX validation.
Indicates the record includes an association to a certificate that must match the end entity certificate provided by the TLS server and must pass PKIX validation.
Indicates the record includes an association to a certificate that MUST be used as the ultimate trust anchor to validate the TLS server's certificate and must pass PKIX validation.
Indicates the record includes an association to a certificate that must match the end entity certificate provided by the TLS server. PKIX validation is not tested.
No standard meaning applied.
Alias; mnemonic for Public Key Infrastructure Trust Anchor
Alias; mnemonic for Public Key Infrastructure End Entity
Alias; mnemonic for DNS-based Authentication of Named Entities Trust Anchor
Alias; mnemonic for DNS-based Authentication of Named Entities End Entity
Alias

db:section.db:para: Other values are currently reserved, but may be unreserved by future standards. This enumeration can be used for those values even if no enumerator is provided.

db:section.db:title: enum QDnsTlsAssociationRecord::MatchingType
db:section.db:para: This enumeration contains valid values for the matching type field of TLS Association queries. The following list is up-to-date with RFC 6698 section 2.1.3 and RFC 7218 section 2.3. Please refer to those documents for authoritative instructions on interpreting this enumeration.

db:td.db:para: Indicates this the certificate or SPKI data is stored verbatim in this record.
Indicates this a SHA-256 checksum of the the certificate or SPKI data present in this record.
Indicates this a SHA-512 checksum of the the certificate or SPKI data present in this record.
No standard meaning applied.
Alias

db:section.db:para: Other values are currently reserved, but may be unreserved by future standards. This enumeration can be used for those values even if no enumerator is provided.

db:section.db:title: enum QDnsTlsAssociationRecord::Selector
db:section.db:para: This enumeration contains valid values for the selector field of TLS Association queries. The following list is up-to-date with RFC 6698 section 2.1.2 and RFC 7218 section 2.2. Please refer to those documents for authoritative instructions on interpreting this enumeration.

db:td.db:para: Indicates this record refers to the full certificate in its binary structure form.
Indicates the record refers to the certificate's subject and public key information, in DER-encoded binary structure form.
No standard meaning applied.
Alias
Alias
Alias

db:section.db:para: Other values are currently reserved, but may be unreserved by future standards. This enumeration can be used for those values even if no enumerator is provided.

db:section.db:title: QDnsTlsAssociationRecord::QDnsTlsAssociationRecord()
db:section.db:para: Constructs an empty TLS Association record.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept] QDnsTlsAssociationRecord::~QDnsTlsAssociationRecord()
db:section.db:para: Destroys this TLS Association record object.

db:section.db:title: QDnsTlsAssociationRecord::MatchingType QDnsTlsAssociationRecord::matchType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the match type field for this record.

db:section.db:title: QString QDnsTlsAssociationRecord::name() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the name of this record.

db:section.db:title: QDnsTlsAssociationRecord::Selector QDnsTlsAssociationRecord::selector() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the selector field for this record.

db:section.db:title: quint32 QDnsTlsAssociationRecord::timeToLive() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the duration in seconds for which this record is valid.

db:section.db:title: QDnsTlsAssociationRecord::CertificateUsage QDnsTlsAssociationRecord::usage() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the certificate usage field for this record.

db:section.db:title: QByteArray QDnsTlsAssociationRecord::value() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the binary data field for this record. The interpretation of this binary data depends on the three numeric fields provided by certificateUsage(), selector(), and matchType().
Do note this is a binary field, even for the checksums, similar to what QCyrptographicHash::result() returns.

db:section.db:title: QDnsTlsAssociationRecord &QDnsTlsAssociationRecord::operator=(const QDnsTlsAssociationRecord &other)
db:section.db:para: Moves the content of other into this object.
